content: HwSecLabSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationHardware Security LabWelcome to Hardware Security Lab!The Hardware Security Lab at Korea University focuses on the security of computing platforms that run software. Our research emphasizes both securing software through hardware-based security primitives and protecting the hardware itself. Specific research topics include the following:Architectural support for verifiable computationHardware Trojan detection and preventionAnti-tampering techniques to prevent reverse engineeringHardware acceleration of cryptographic algorithmsDedicating general-purpose devicesTechnical support for personal data controlWe also conduct research on blockchain technologies, including the following areas:Secure and convenient blockchain walletValidator operating platformDetection of abnormal transactions and money launderingZero-knowledge proof accelerationGoogle SitesReport abuseGoogle SitesReport abuse
